‘Hydrogen Highway’ Network of Refueling Stations to Span Alberta Cities But demand for hydrogen-powered vehicles remains low, and claims the gas is a net-zero technology are still unproven.

The post ‘Hydrogen Highway’ Network of Refueling Stations to Span Alberta Cities appeared first on DeSmog.
title: ‘Hydrogen Highway’ Network of Refueling Stations to Span Alberta Cities
